model.common
Class History

java.lang.Object
  model.common.History

public class History
extends java.lang.Object

The history class keeps charge of any changes made to the vaults. It has the ability to undo any changes. 

 Product.UndoAction() // Reverts the vault to how it was before

Method Detail

AddAction

public Result AddAction(IModel currentModel,
                        IModel newModel)
This should be called by passing the currentModel in the vault to the new model that is being created. It will create the action and push it to the history

Parameters:
currentModel - Model in Vault which is copied to the action
newModel - Model yet to be saved, this will point directly to it the vault
Returns:

UndoAction

public Result UndoAction()
Pops the last action and makes sure to revert it back. It returns the vaults back to how they should be.

Returns:
